item.title: The fire broke out in Los Angeles at about 10:30 (18:30 GMT) on Tuesday and rapidly spread in incredibly dry conditions and high winds. #Wildfire #LA #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews

item.title: A body has been found in search for two British hikers who went missing in the Dolomites, Italy's alpine rescue service has said. Aziz Ziriat, 36, and Samuel Harris, 35, from London, were last heard from on 1 January. #Hikers #Britain #Dolomites #London #
